oai_dc:dc.dc:title: Brown's Creek Missionary Baptist Church: cemetery with metalwork sign
oai_dc:dc.dc:creator: West, Carroll Van, photographer
oai_dc:dc.dc:description: 673 Brown Creek Rd, Brownsville, Haywood Co., TN 38012
Black and white photograph of grave markers at Brown's Creek Church cemetery. A white metal-work sign stands to the left, marking the location of the Brown's Creek school.

The congregation of Brown's Creek was founded ca. 1835. The church building was renovated in 1973. The cemetery near the church includes a white metal-work sign marking the location of the Brown's Creek school.
